name: TossaCoin
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: toss a coin
des:
-Ask Alexa to toss the coin to trigger this skill.
-Are you out of coin or the coins are out of reach but you really need to know your luck, use this Alexa skill and you will instantly know what the outcome of the toss will be.
-Enjoy!!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
